h1_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit
h2_title: Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit
content: The Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit allows you to take the form of both enemies, who stick together to form the entire iron ball before smashing directly into your enemies three times over. The iron ball is extremely powerful, and the three full hits make the Spirit move even stronger.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Top_Takes_Bottom,_Bottom_Takes_Top_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
The Top Takes Bottom, Bottom Takes Top Spirit allows you to take the form of both enemies, who stick together to form the entire iron ball before smashing directly into your enemies three times over. The iron ball is extremely powerful, and the three full hits make the Spirit move even stronger.
